bio: Creation of articles and another content about OP Superchain for educational aim
contributionDescription: I create content, including for educational purposes to attract new users to Superchain. I create articles, Twitter threads, translations. Also, as a designer, I create NFT by my own design on Base, Zora, OP. I write articles not only on my own, but also for the newspaper "The Optimist" and earlier for "Optimism News". Translations into Russian and Ukrainian attract the Russian-speaking and Ukrainian-speaking community that lives all over the world. My main goal is to provide content for educational purposes and attract new users to Superchain.

contributionLinks.description: An article about RetroPGF #3 for education
An article about Sound.xyz - project on OP Mainnet for introducing the ecosystem
one of the examples of translations of official articles into Russian
one of the examples of translations of official articles into Ukrainian
one more article for The Optimist that explains Co-Granting
creating an NFT of my own design on the Base Network (Zora Platform)
Creation content for "Optimism News" (one more example)

impactDescription: As I said translations into Russian and Ukrainian attract the Russian-speaking and Ukrainian-speaking community that lives all over the world. My main goal is to provide content for educational purposes and attract new users to Superchain by my educational content. You can see how many people was involved in Ambassador Program because of my thread (I give an impact metrics below)

fundingSources.description: I have'nt received it yet, but I think that now deserving no less that 3k OP

pwCategorySuggestions: Smart Contract Platforms, Non-Fungible Tokens (NFTs), Content Creation, Community Engagement, Blockchain Education
